title: Early recognition of learning disabilities
creator_credit: Barrie Angus McLean, Robert Anderson, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Contemporary Films and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Children of six and seven who are bright and cheerful but for various reasons are not yet able to cope with the demands made in grade one classroom; also gives the opportunity of entering the home of one of the children.
creator_credit_for_label: Barrie Angus McLean, Robert Anderson, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Contemporary Films and McGraw-Hill Films
